title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.18 - Measures required to eliminate damaging vibrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.18 - Measures required to eliminate damaging vibrations

State Regulations

All persons in their operations and use of space at the

World Trade Center shall take all reasonable measures to eliminate vibrations
tending to damage any part of the World Trade Center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1290.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
